Sinopse: Jack is a very supportive uncle to Ashley, always there when she calls. He plays a big role in her life due to her mother being busy a lot, and her dad living a gangster lifestyle. Later he starts receiving calls from Ashley who is calling from the past. Jack must help Ashley change her almost inevitable fate.—howellwyland
